pages.text: The $(thing)Travelling Merchant$() will occasionally appear to sell and buy various items. Currently it's the only way to acquire certain blocks and items.
Currently the appearance is the same as $(thing)Wandering Trader$().

$(thing)Travelling Merchant$() will spawn by the $(item)Teahouse Flag$() when there are players in the vicinity of the flag. They will usually spawn along with $(thing)Wandering Traders$() as their spawning times are linked.
$(item)Teahouse Flag$() can be crafted and placed to spawn the $(thing)Travelling Merchant$().

The currency of choice of the $(thing)Travelling Merchant$() is $(item)Copper Cash Coin$(). You can sell items to them to acquire them, and use them to buy other items. $(br)The trades can be consulted in JEI.
